text:
Olivia Theresa Longott (born 15 February 1981, in Brooklyn, New York, USA) is an American actress and singer. She was also on the series.
Early life and career.
Longott was born in Brooklyn, New York. She was raised in New York City. She studied music at Bayside High School. She started her career in her teenage years. She released her first single in 2000.
